data.title: The Final Girl Support Group
data.author: Grady Hendrix
data.description: A fast-paced, thrilling horror novel that follows a group of heroines to die for, from the brilliant New York Times bestselling author of The Southern Book Club's Guide to Slaying Vampires.In horror movies, the final girl is the one who’s left standing when the credits roll.

data.title: She's Too Pretty to Burn
data.author: Wendy Heard
data.description: An electric romance set against a rebel art scene sparks lethal danger for two girls in She's Too Pretty to Burn, an expertly plotted YA thriller by Wendy Heard.

data.title: Sorrowland
data.author: Rivers Solomon
data.description: A triumphant, genre-bending breakout novel from one of the boldest new voices in contemporary fiction Vern—seven months pregnant and desperate to escape the strict religious compound where she was raised—flees for the shelter of the woods.

data.title: When Katie Met Cassidy
data.author: Camille Perri
data.description: From the acclaimed author of The Assistants comes another gutsy book about two women who find their lives turned upside down by their unexpected chemistry.

data.title: The Stars and the Blackness Between Them
data.author: Junauda Petrus
data.description: The Stars and the Blackness Between Them is an American young adult fiction book by Junauda Petrus.

data.title: The House in the Cerulean Sea
data.author: TJ Klune
data.description: Linus Baker is a by-the-book case worker in the Department in Charge of Magical Youth. He's tasked with determining whether six dangerous magical children are likely to bring about the end of the world.
